bibl.title: Report on Two Seasons of Fieldwork in Theban Tomb #46.
bibl.note: See in part. p. 369: Ostraca. [Nearly three dozen ostraca: four short texts were written in Demotic; the majority were Coptic. A Coptic liturgical text appeared on fragments of a ribbed amphora (fig. 18).] - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Annales du Service des antiquités d'Égypte

bibl.seg: Susan Redford, Report on Two Seasons of Fieldwork in Theban Tomb #46.

See in part. p. 369: Ostraca. [Nearly three dozen ostraca: four short texts were written in Demotic; the majority were Coptic. A Coptic liturgical text appeared on fragments of a ribbed amphora (fig. 18).] - Avec résumé en anglais.
